title: Sid Meier’s Pirates 1.1.2 – Open-ended seafaring adventure

title: WidsMob Screen Recorder 1.1 – Record videos, capture audios and take snapshots
content: WidsMob Screen Recorder is an easy and professional method to record videos, capture audio and take snapshots of onscreen activities on Mac. title: Colors PRO 1.6.2 – Color picker, color scheme, and color palette tool
content: Colors PRO is a color picker, color scheme, and color palette tool. Colors PRO comes bundled with a Color Picker Plugin. title: Trim Enabler 4.2 – Write faster to any SSD
content: Trim Enabler brings trim to OS X. It’s as easy as flipping a switch. Trim is must-have feature for most Solid State Drives.
